text: Abange mmwe abakkiriza (mukimanye nti), mazima abagatta ku Katonda e bintu e birala bajama, tebasembereranga omuzikiti ogw’emizizo oluvanyuma lw’omwaka gwabwe guno. Bwe muba mutidde bwavu, Katonda bwanaaba ayagadde ajja kubagaggawaza nga aggya mu bigabwabye, anti mazima Katonda mumanyi nnyo mugoba nsonga
